name: TITAN SLAYER Ⅱ
detailed_description:
■True experience of VR action game

The battle will depend on how you move.
Your physical ability will affect a lot to game score.
Move big and sharpen up your skill to beat enormous enemies.

■Move location to find a boss

Introducing new movement system will let you improving your game action.
Slay enemies by your skill and reach out to boss area.

■Choose your weapon depending on a situation

You need to grasp your surroundings instantly and determine what would be the best for you.
What you choose depending on a situation will be the key to divide your success.

■Experience highly optimized VR performance

With the power of Unreal Engine 4, we can give you the best VR experience you had ever done before.
You will be overwhelmed to the worldview and reality of this game.
Feel the evolution of VR game by playing TITAN SLAYER II.

■Wait for an update
In our plan, We gradually added some feature like character’s growth system, more weapon types.
We would like to get all the feedback and reflect it back into the game.
We will be happy to make this extraordinary game with you!!

short_description: TITAN SLAYER is back to VR world!!!Fighting against massive giant creature by using your sword, bow and gun. Introducing a whole new movement system will let you improving your game action.Use your whole body and skills to fight against enormous enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy TITAN SLAYER Ⅱ Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 24,99€ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 24,99€.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent violence, gore, phisical defect will be included.
